item.title: Alpine Installation
item.description: Why Alpine Linux Alpine Linux is a lightweight, security-focused, rolling release distribution with a fast and efficient package manager. It is highly customizable and compatible with a wide range of hardware architectures, making it suitable for use in a variety of environments. Preparation Download the Alpine Linux ISO image file from the official website: https://alpinelinux.org/downloads/ Write the ISO image file to a USB drive using a tool such as Rufus or Etcher.
